plot: Two men from different social status meet one day to confront their view on life and willing to exchange them by way of a backpack.
title: La mochila
plot_es: Two men from different social status meet one day to confront their view on life and willing to exchange them by way of a backpack.
plot_en: Two men from different social status meet one day to confront their view on life and willing to exchange them by way of a backpack.
